result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Belinda C Lewis

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Belinda C Lewis in court with attorney Ryan O'Hara.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF233 and 14CF256. State relates agreement. 
15CF233 - State moves to dismiss and read in. Court orders this case be dismissed and read-in. 
14CF256 - State moves to amend both counts to 948.22(3). Court grants amendment. Defendant pleads guilty to both counts. Court accepts the pleas and finds the Defendant guilty of both counts. 
Argument by State. Argument by Defense. Defendant addresses the Court. 

Court relates and orders: 
90 days jail on each count - consecutive. Credit for 56 days on count 1 if revoked.  - STAYED

2 years probation - IMPOSED. Must report by 9/16/15 by 3:00 PM. 
Must pay child support in full and on time through WI SCTF 
Must maintin full time employment. 
If unemployed or underemployed, must seek work at 5 places per week and submit a monthly report to the probation agent and child support agency. 
Must report change of employment of address within 48 hours to the child support agency and probation officer. 
Must pay $400.00 in extradition fees owed to the Child Support Agency. 
$4000.00 cash bond is to be paid to the District Attorney's Trust Fund. The District Attorney's Office will make payment to the Child Support Agency for Child Support Arrears. 
Costs.

Defendant Belinda C Lewis in court with attorney Ryan O'Hara.  Defendant Belinda C Lewis in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF233 & 14CF256

BOTH FILES RESET

FAX JAIL  Plea hearing scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

BOND COVERS 14CF256 AND 15CF233.  $2,500.00 CASH IS IN ADDITION TO CASH PREVIOUSLY POSTED.
Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must not leave the State of Wisconsin without the Court's permission.
Must reside with her mother in Rice Lake during the pendency of these proceedings.

Defendant Belinda C Lewis in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Belinda C Lewis in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CF256 and 15CF233 called.  Quash warrants in both cases.  State relates and requests bonds be modified to $2,500.00 cash to cover both cases in addition to what she has already posted with the same conditions.  Attorney Raymond relates.  Court orders bond modified to $2,500.00 additional cash bond to cover both cases with same conditions.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Body only - Wisconsin and adjacent States
Body only - Wisconsin and adjacent States.

Attorney Ryan O'Hara in court.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF233 and 14CF256
15CF233 State moves to issue a Bench warrant - Body only - Wisconsin and Adjacent State. Court grants. 
14CF256 - Warrant previously filed.

Defendant Belinda C Lewis in court with attorney Ryan O'Hara.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
11:44   Deputy Jeff Wolfe  with BNSO called, sworn, direct by State
Judicial notice taken in 14CF256
Witness identified the defendant
11:49  cross by Defense attorney OHara
Argument by State
  Probable Cause Found and Bound Over
  Information Filed. Defense waives reading;
  Plea of Not Guilty


  Plea hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must not leave the State of Wisconsin without Court permission.

Defendant Belinda C Lewis in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Belinda C Lewis in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Qualifies for Public Defender (Ryan O'Hara will represent).  Bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 11:45 am.
